description: Generate embeddings using IBM watsonx.ai models.

url.info: The base URL of the API.

project_id.info: The project ID or deployment space ID that is associated with the foundation model.

api_key.info: The API Key to use for the model.

input_text.display_name: Include the original text in the output

errors.fetch_timeout: Request timeout while fetching models from watsonx.ai. Using default model list.
errors.fetch_http_error: HTTP error {status} while fetching models from watsonx.ai. Using default model list.
errors.fetch_failed: Error fetching models from watsonx.ai: {error}. Using default model list.

logs.fetching_models: Fetching available models from watsonx.ai - Base URL: {base_url}
logs.models_updated: Updated model options: {count} model(s) found in {url}
logs.configuring_parameters: Configuring embedding parameters - Truncate tokens: {truncate_tokens}, Include text: {include_text}
